trials.page_content: Dax is a lot like Earth.  It has seven continents in similar places, but instead of Africa, Europe, Asia,
Australia, Antarctica and North and South America, the continents
are called  Aga,  Benli, Caro, Dodi, Ente, Fale, and Gomi. Its climate is a lot like Earth's, too. But the
plants and animals of Dax are quite different.
Wint lived a long time ago in the mountains.  But all aliens remember Wint and admire him because he
was the one that found the lost city of Baff. While he wasn't exploring,
Wint stayed in his village in the mountains. He was a hunter and
a blacksmith.
Krens are a tribe of the aliens that live on the continent of Benli, which has no agriculture. Like
trials.predicate_2: do something else for a living

trials.page_content: most creatures on Dax, Krens eat other creatures to survive. Animals like stups, four-legged creatures
trials.predicate_2: do something else for a living

trials.page_content: with large antlers, are a resource for the Krens. Stups roam all over the windy highlands of Dax, far
trials.predicate_2: do something else for a living

trials.page_content: from the sea. For a living, krens are stup-herders and
trials.predicate_2: do something else for a living

trials.page_content: fishermen.
trials.predicate_2: do something else for a living
do something else for a living

trials.page_content: Wopis are extremely rare creatures. They only live in the desert and
they all are very hard to find, since they live underground. Wopis sleep for more than twelve hours a day
and for less than six hours a day.
Ollers spend most of their lives in water, but occasionally come on land to gather berries. Ollers use
trials.predicate_2: carry their young in something else

trials.page_content: tools on land but have a difficult time making them. So the tools are passed down from parents to
trials.predicate_2: carry their young in something else

trials.page_content: children, so that each family only has one of each kind of tool. Baby ollers find it very exciting to be on
trials.predicate_2: carry their young in something else

trials.page_content: land, but they have trouble walking and need to be carried by family
trials.predicate_2: carry their young in something else

trials.page_content: members. While on land, ollers carry their young in guklags
trials.predicate_2: carry their young in something else

trials.page_content: and trullets.

trials.page_content: Isooms are tree-like plants that are found in hilly regions of Fale. Their fruit is edible, and the aliens often
cultivate isooms for food. The skin of the fruit that isooms produce is bumpy and
smooth.
Fengnors are smaller, nocturnal creatures that live in dense forests.
They have complex mating habits. They mate for life and the males
often bring twigs and leaves to the females during courtship. The mated pairs use these twigs and
leaves to build their quite elaborate nests in gluers
and watch over them carefully.
Occasionally on Dax, there will be tremendous ice storms that freeze over the entire planet. These ice

trials.page_content: storms never last long or result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax. However,

trials.page_content: The Ludinos are an alien tribe. They are very industrious and live on all of the seven continents,
trials.query_predicate_1: live in the continent of Aga

trials.page_content: and they all are highly spiritual. They ascribe to Cabooism
trials.query_predicate_1: live in the continent of Aga

trials.page_content: and follow a strict code of laws.
Vimbles are social insects that live in colonies of up to a thousand individuals. Vimbles live for a year
or less. They have a single queen, who must find somewhere to
hibernate over the winter before starting a new colony. Vimble
queens hibernate in fallen logs
and in the abandoned burrows of other animals.
Glippets are large creatures, quite intelligent, with a life-span of about
trials.predicate_1: live on the continent of Caro

trials.page_content: sixty years. They live on the southern continent of Caro and
trials.predicate_1: live on the continent of Caro

trials.page_content: on the northern continent of Este.
trials.predicate_1: live on the continent of Caro

trials.page_content: The soil on the continent of Aga is very fertile, and the aliens have learned to grow many crops.
However, farmers only grow one type of crop in each season to increase their profits when selling.
Their farms are very big, often stretching several miles in every direction. During the springtime,
the aliens flood their fields in order to plant  fujusi
and soroneeks.
Mooks are ferocious creatures that live on the continent of Benli. Benli
trials.predicate_1: have territories at the tops of tall mountains
trials.predicate_2: have territories in other geographical locations
